import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import "./Main.css"; function Main() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState({ meno: "", priezvisko: "", cislo_bytu: "" }); const [error, setError] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { // Fetch user info from the server const fetchUserInfo = async () => { try { const userName = localStorage.getItem("userName"); // Retrieve the user name from localStorage const response = await fetch(`http://localhost:3001/getUserInfo?name=${userName}`); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error("Failed to fetch user info"); } const data = await response.json(); setUserInfo({ meno: data.meno, priezvisko: data.priezvisko, cislo_bytu: data.cislo_bytu }); } catch (error) { setError("Error fetching user info"); } }; fetchUserInfo(); }, []); // Logout function const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem("isAuthenticated"); localStorage.removeItem("userName"); // Remove userName on logout navigate("/"); }; return (
